DataSourceDefinition.Name: REP-062_02
DataSourceDefinition.Expression:
SELECT DISTINCT TER.COD_TERR, CON.NUM_CONC, CON.VAL_NOMB, PER_INI.VAL_NOMB_PERI AS PERIODO_INICIAL, PER_FIN.VAL_NOMB_PERI AS PERIODO_FINA, CLI_RECTE.COD_CLIE AS COD_CLIE_RECTE, CLI_RECTE.VAL_APE1 ||' '|| CLI_RECTE.VAL_APE2 ||' '|| CLI_RECTE.VAL_NOM1 NOMBRE_RECTE, CLI_RECDO.COD_CLIE AS COD_CLIE_RECDO, PER_INGRE.VAL_NOMB_PERI AS PERIODO_INGRESO, CLI_RECDO.VAL_APE1 ||' '|| CLI_RECDO.VAL_APE2 ||' '|| CLI_RECDO.VAL_NOM1 NOMBRE_RECDO, CLI_ID.NUM_DOCU_IDEN, GEN_INCUM.MOTIVO_INCUM, COUNT( cli_recte.OID_CLIE) OVER (PARTITION BY GEN_INCUM.MOTIVO_INCUM
) AS CONS_MOT_INCUM,
COUNT (DISTINCT can_gan.BINC_OID_BASE_INCU) OVER() AS incum_un_adm_Pais, NULL AS metrica_sin_uso FROM inc_concu_param_gener con, inc_candi_ganad can_gan, inc_clien_recdo recdo, inc_clien_recte recte, cra_perio per_ini, cra_perio per_fin, cra_perio per_ingre, mae_clien cli_recdo, mae_clien cli_recte, mae_clien_ident cli_id, mae_clien_unida_admin un_adm, zon_terri_admin ter_adm, zon_terri ter, zon_secci sec, zon_zona zon, zon_regio reg, zon_sub_geren_venta subg, ( SELECT val_oid, val_i18n motivo_incum FROM v_gen_i18n_sicc WHERE attr_enti = 'INC_BASE_INCUM' AND idio_oid_idio = %value_IDIOMAVALUE% ) gen_incum
WHERE CON.OID_PARA_GRAL IN (%value_NUMEROCONCURSOVALUES%) AND CON.PAIS_OID_PAIS = %value_PAISVALUE% AND CON.MARC_OID_MARC = %value_MARCAVALUE% AND CON.CANA_OID_CANA = %value_CANALVALUE%
AND CON.PERD_OID_PERI_DESD = PER_INI.OID_PERI AND CON.PERD_OID_PERI_HAST = PER_FIN.OID_PERI
AND RECDO.IND_EFEC is null AND RECDO.CLIE_OID_CLIE = CLI_RECDO.OID_CLIE AND RECTE.CLIE_OID_CLIE = CLI_RECTE.OID_CLIE AND RECDO.CLR3_OID_CLIE_RETE = RECTE.OID_CLIE_RETE AND RECDO.PERD_OID_PERI = PER_INGRE.OID_PERI
AND RECTE.COPA_OID_PARA_GRAL = CON.OID_PARA_GRAL
AND UN_ADM.CLIE_OID_CLIE = RECte.CLIE_OID_CLIE
AND UN_ADM.IND_ACTI = 1 AND UN_ADM.ZTAD_OID_TERR_ADMI = TER_ADM.OID_TERR_ADMI AND TER_ADM.TERR_OID_TERR = TER.OID_TERR
AND TER_ADM.ZSCC_OID_SECC = SEC.OID_SECC AND SEC.ZZON_OID_ZONA = ZON.OID_ZONA AND ZON.ZORG_OID_REGI = REG.OID_REGI AND REG.ZSGV_OID_SUBG_VENT = SUBG.OID_SUBG_VENT
AND CLI_RECDO.OID_CLIE(+) = cli_id.CLIE_OID_CLIE AND CLI_ID.VAL_IDEN_DOCU_PRIN(+) = 1 AND CLI_ID.TDOC_OID_TIPO_DOCU(+) = 1
%start_SUBGERENCIAVENTAVALUES% AND SUBG.OID_SUBG_VENT IN (%value_SUBGERENCIAVENTAVALUES%) %end_SUBGERENCIAVENTAVALUES%
AND CAN_GAN.BINC_OID_BASE_INCU = gen_incum.val_oid(+)
%start_MOTIVOSINCUMPLIMIENTOVALUES% AND CAN_GAN.BINC_OID_BASE_INCU IN (%value_MOTIVOSINCUMPLIMIENTOVALUES%) %end_MOTIVOSINCUMPLIMIENTOVALUES%
AND CAN_GAN.CLIE_OID_CLIE = RECTE.CLIE_OID_CLIE AND CAN_GAN.COPA_OID_PARA_GRAL = RECTE.COPA_OID_PARA_GRAL ORDER BY ter.COD_TERR, CON.NUM_CONC, GEN_INCUM.MOTIVO_INCUM
